text: @gtconway3d Doctors are saying now they can't prescribe those drugs now because fools like Trump have claimed they are the cure so of course they are in short supply. Yet the Lupus Foundation says, those with Lupus are substantially more likely to get Covid-19 regardless of the drugs taken.
